summary: Through hypnotism and telepathic mind control, a sinister music maestro controls the singing voice, but not the heart, of the woman he loves.
cast: John Barrymore|Marian Marsh|Donald Crisp|Bramwell Fletcher|Carmel Myers|Luis Alberni|Lumsden Hare|Paul Porcasi|Ferike Boros|Adrienne D'Ambricourt|Yola d'Avril|Rose Dione|Julia Griffith|Henry Otto|Sam Savitsky|Ellinor Vanderveer
title: Svengali
